lenders.name: Megan & Erik
lenders.loan_because: In a world full of social injustices, we want to do whatever possible as human beings to make a difference in someone's life. Howard Zinn delivers a challenge when he says, ''To be neutral and to be passive is to collaborate with whatever is going on.'' Democracy he defines as ''not just a counting-up of votes'' but a ''counting-up of actions.''
lenders.occupational_info: As social studies teachers, we work to bring knowledge and understanding to our students in the areas of history, politics, government and geography.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see how people around the world are improving their lives and satisfying to feel I can be a part of it.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have access to credit (and preferably savings but that's a harder beast to deal with!)
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct impact evaluations on projects in developing countries on transportation, early grade reading, microfinance, water and sanitation, and at-risk youth.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Human Geography to children that are 11-13 years old.  We learn about people and places all over the world.  We just finished studying South Africa, India and Mexico.  I love to watch the students light up as they learn about new parts of their ever changing world.

lenders.name: Lis
lenders.loan_because: regardless of one's personal trials we are all connected as brothers and sisters and deserve the opportunity to better our lives. I am thankful to be able to lend and share with people who have the courage and strength to ask for support. Thank you Zach for the wonderful gift you gave me so I might share it with others! May those whose lives we touch be as spiritually blessed and filled with a loving light as I have been. In peace, Lis
lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to caption for people who are challenged (deaf, hard of hearing, low vision, etc) in schools, colleges, conferences, and workshops.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: You derserve it!

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: businesses need capital to grow.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: When so little can change someone's life so much, how can I not get invloved!
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers by day and drive my two busy teenagers from place to place at night.

lenders.name: Lissa
lenders.loan_because: It's the smart, just, compassionate, and plain old right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring healing to people through the use of sound and music.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It is amazing to see people actually recieving your money and making their lives better through it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a four-year university in the United States, and am studying to be an Elementary School teacher

lenders.name: Liam
lenders.loan_because:
A lot of government aid ends up in dubious projects run by big multinational companies.
http://www.aidwatch.org.au/

I use this table as part of my loan selection criteria (portfolio yield=interest rate):
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiva_(organization)#Interest_rates

lenders.name: Johnson's
lenders.loan_because: Small Business owner ourselves and we love to help

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help people around the world and to make sure that the help goes to the people that need it.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: When I see that someone is trying to make their life better, I want to help. I like to loan to people that already have a business going and are trying to improve it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes cleaning equipment. My job is mostly with computers and helping the other people I work with to use them.

lenders.name: Remco
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the way how I can and should contribute to a better world

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Gerra
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to make a difference in someone's life and to help impoverished nations grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college science majors how to write better.

lenders.name: Elad
lenders.loan_because: I learned a saying in my life, "Sharing is caring". I try to follow it every day.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I'm an independent entrepreneur type of person myself and want to support people who just need a bit of a leg up to start their own businesses. I am so lucky to live in Canada. Even a seemingly small amount of money (to us) can be a huge amount to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate to work for myself doing jewelry design, graphic design, and photography.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed, and all people need is a chance.  We become more compassionate when we help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a performer--I sing opera, and spend much of my life onstage in crazy costumes making a lot of sound!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: When I was a fundraiser I always loved grassroots efforts and Kiva is a champion grassroots initiative - inspiring and effective
lenders.occupational_info: I was a full time mom, then a teacher, then a fundraiser and now I run a website where families and organizations make personalized cookbooks with pictures, recipes and stories

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Someone once loaned to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer at the burn unit at Brooke Army Medical Center in San Antonio Texas.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: it gives me great pleasure to know that what  I give can help someone run their own business, add value to society, and make needed money for their families.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to do something that I know will make a difference in fighting poverty. I also believe in "teaching a man to fish," so microloans are the perfect fit.

lenders.name: Davide
lenders.loan_because: Loans are more useful and motivating than charities, and it is a good way to bypass governments, maintaining contact with entrepreneurs at the same time.

lenders.name: Ricky
lenders.loan_because:
Why not you can't take it with you.
To helps others out.
God has blessed me now I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Life is what you make it so why not make it fun.
GO PACK GO

lenders.name: Kelly Westphall
lenders.occupational_info: I am a rancher who works HARD everyday to try to make a better place and mindset for my daughter. My husband and I raise cattle, pigs, chickens, and we also grow fruit trees and save seeds for our own garden. We try to barter almost everything because we don't have the money to buy, but to us that doesn't matter, as long as we can help others and live on just necessities we are VERY happy. Giving back to the land and people is very important and helping others in the community of life is mandatory. :)

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
The smallest good deed is better than the grandest good intention.
- Duguet

No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. 
- Aesop
lenders.occupational_info: Account Executive.

lenders.name: Adriaan
lenders.loan_because: if you have any extra income you should give it to someone who needs it much more that you.  Helping a person get back on their feet or giving them the hope that they can continue on in their endeavor is much more valuable than anything you could buy for yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior at Oberlin College in Ohio.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: i believe we can all make a difference, one person at a time...

lenders.name: DaNelle
lenders.loan_because: I want the dreams of the creative people in this world to be realized.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the energy efficiency program for low income residents of the city of Phoenix.

lenders.name: Lea
lenders.loan_because: I hope that this will enable others to enjoy their life and improve their family circumstances
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other businesses to teach them how to improve what they do.

lenders.name: Aethyrius
lenders.loan_because: I support endeavors that empower people to make positive changes in their lives and the world around them. I donate to Kiva.org directly as well as funding loans to assist program participants.
lenders.occupational_info: As a practicing alchemist and instructor in the Western Mystery Tradition, I am dedicated to teaching and facilitating Illumination Through the Western Mysteries.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupational_info: Market Research for Warner Bros. Pictures

lenders.name: Hoan
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping others

lenders.name: Jamie in Atlanta
lenders.loan_because: That whole do unto others thing...oh yeah and because my Mama raised me to be kind.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I firmly believe that business is the key to creating greater wealth rather than simple charity.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with an income (even though minimal) and I like to share it with others, as I believe it can make a big impact in this world. I always have all my needs met, I share my money to help others have their needs met.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher with young children. I work caring for children with single mothers, while their mothers work.

lenders.name: Ashleigh
lenders.loan_because: There should be no more 'have-nots.'
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school for a degree in International Development.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps...
lenders.occupational_info: In the workplace, I help people when they have problems and I also help them achieve goals.

lenders.name: Cindy Diamond
lenders.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur.  I realize we don't get anywhere in life without others.  I just want to make a difference in peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a third generation chocolatier and own the family business.

lenders.name: Joe Ross
lenders.loan_because: What a Super way to help the World !!    I have been very blessed and this is a great way to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entreprenuer also. I know the value of being able to borrow to expand or start-up a business.

lenders.name: The Nienows
lenders.loan_because: We are excited about finding a simple, direct way to respond to the compassion God has placed on our hearts.

lenders.name: syawal
lenders.loan_because: settle personal debt.
lenders.occupational_info: freelancer.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I could have never made it to where I am in my life without a little help along the way.  I am just returning the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare culinary dishes for patrons at the restaurant where I work.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: economic opportunity is the pathway to social justice and a sustainable world for all of us. And because I am a mother and wish that all children had the opportunities my son does.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a political activist; I work to change my community and make it a fairer and kinder place, particularly for lesbians and gay men.

lenders.name: sasha
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place...
lenders.occupational_info: High school student (11th grade)

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian and I believe God calls us to give. It truly benefits the world.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like to help out where I can because I feel that I am very fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I design cabinetry for kitchens and bathrooms.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good job and a good education, and this is a brilliant, empowering and viable way of passing on a little extra to hard-working people who need it.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.occupation: Consultant - I am on the right w/ a client
lenders.loan_because: I BELIEVE PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO MAKE THEIR WORLD A BETTER PLACE THROUGH BUSINESS OWNERSHIP AND SERVING THE NEEDS  OF THEIR COMMUNITY DESERVE A HELPING HAND TO GET STARTED AND BE SUCCESSFUL.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A BUSINESS CONSULTANT WHO HELPS COMPANIES OF ALL SIZES BECOME MORE PROFITABLE AND PRODUCTIVE. I FOUNDED MY OWN BUSINESS 12 YEARS AGO, AND WHILE SOME YEARS ARE GREAT AND SOME ARE TOUGH, I BELIEVE THAT STARTING YOUR OWN BUSINESS IS THE BEST WAY TO EMPOWER YOURSELF AND HELP YOUR COMMUNITY.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: a little bit can make an enormous difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help individuals and small businesses by creating beautiful, easy-to-navigate, web sites.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to share my limited good fortune and to support the dreams and hard work of others. I have a special affinity in supporting those pursuing a career in the arts.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to improve the quality and reliability of software by way of testing techniques and improvement of processes.

lenders.name: SON
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Rob Banga
lenders.loan_because: I've seen the devastation that the inescapable cycle of poverty can have on individuals.  I believe  strategically placed capital  intended to enable and empower people can have a very positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Husband.  Father of two daughters.  Live in Seattle.

lenders.name: wadhwani
lenders.loan_because: I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I do nothing.

lenders.name: Winnie
lenders.loan_because: I know how it is like to be given an opportunity, and I hope to give back by contributing to someone else's opportunity. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites, identities and printed collaterals for a living. Would love to travel and work at the same time, one day.

lenders.name: mette
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to help people with small amounts that means a lot to them and very little for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with disabled young people,to help them them get a better quality of life.So they can join aktivity`s when they are not at work at places that are arranged for their handicap.Such as disco,swimming,keep their flat tidy,get dressed,and whatever they need assistance to manage.It is a job that gives me very much back.I feel Ido something very useful,and still gives me a lot of challenge,whichI like in my job!

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: Planning software systems and websites.

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.occupation: Adventure Nature and Culture tourist guide
lenders.loan_because: I am a Sri Lankan tourist guide who doing tours in central mountain region of the cuntry. I want to get the web site domain name srilankatrekking.com This domain name is a famas one in tourist guide books. But now it is taken by a domin name collector in America. I try to pay him 100$. What he agreed. But I could not do that. But the owner Mr carlos given me the domain name server to me. please check srilankatrekking.com Now I want him to pay that money 100$.
lenders.occupational_info: I am doing a interesting but seasonal job. A tourist guide who doing adventure mountain trekking in beautiful Knuckles mountain range in central Sri Lanka and Other natural and cultural placess in all Sri Lanka

lenders.name: Melita
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to have seen and experienced some amazing things.  During my travels I have been welcomed by those with very limited resources.  Now I have found a great platform to give back...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of a beautiful 7 year old boy.  My job is to nuture this young child into grown man but I hear it won't stop there!

lenders.name: andre
lenders.loan_because: I like to support the work people untertake to improve their life.

lenders.name: NBC Wildcats
lenders.loan_because: This is our chance to sacrifice a little to make a huge difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students in a 7th grade world geography class located in Western Michigan.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because:
"We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop."
-Mother Theresa
lenders.occupational_info: Aerospace materials / test engineer.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much in this world, and others deserve the same opportunities as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help college students attain their educational goals.

lenders.name: Jonathan Cross
lenders.loan_because:
I have traveled a lot in Asia & Eastern Europe and found immense generosity everywhere.  I was often frustrated in my attempts to "help" those disadvantaged by the current economic system and was looking for a constructive way return the generosity.  Giving away money directly to people doesn't work and I am skeptical of large, western NGOs.  

Kiva was a "no-brainer" for me.  In this economy, this is the only investment which guaranteed a positive return!
lenders.occupational_info: I make web pages for Google, volunteer when possible and have spent almost 6 years "on the road" exploring this beautiful earth.

lenders.name: steve p
lenders.loan_because: Because I have been blessed in my life so much and the greatest expression of my gratitude is to bless others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the restaurant business feeding adn servicing guests

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Organizing and mobilizing a denomination of churches who's mission is to change the world.

lenders.name: Carson
lenders.loan_because: The feeling of building something yourself is incredibly gratifying and empowering. I've been fortunate enough to enjoy both the experience and the fruits of it. I enjoy helping others do the same.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: we each can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to fly!

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: We've worked hard to become successful in our own small business & we hope to help someone else less fortunate do the same.  We believe in supporting those who want to make their lives better by hard work & sacrifice.  Our lives have been blessed in many ways and we hope that our involvement in Kiva helps us pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small dental office.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I realized that for the price of a movie and a pizza, I could make a difference in someone's life. I am grateful for this opportunity to help those with less.

lenders.name: Marquis
lenders.loan_because: Love giving that push to energized entrepreneurs which can lead them to success!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help to make creative ideas a reality. I also assist in steering the Federal Government in successfully taking advantage of electronic communication.

lenders.name: Tessa
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I research things we might expect to see in the future (usually in 10-20 years)

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupation: Executive Director of Plug In Carolina
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism needs capital to work.  I loan to Kiva because of its track record of success.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: Productivity is not a relative term, unlike wealth; the more productive people are in the world, the better off we all will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I prevent disease by studying both disease organisms and related organisms.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Investments, rather than handouts, are the basis for real economic progress. Social and technological progress are natural corollaries to this.

"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I can and this is a very direct way to make a long lasting impact.

lenders.name: Pippa
lenders.loan_because: im happy to help out
lenders.occupational_info: self diciplined, home based,creative

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because:
I am a firm believer in "Do unto others as you would have others do unto you." I do not enjoy purchasing goods knowing that they were probably made at the expense of someone else.

    I am also a small business operator, who is lucky enough to not have been born into poverty, with access to greater financial services.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own small retail store. I try to specialize in products and services that both entertain and engage our youth.

lenders.name: Bruce & Joy
lenders.occupation: Bruce:  Group Life  Underwriter  Joy:  Artist
lenders.occupational_info:
Bruce:  If your employer provides you with life insurance, I determine how much you should get and what it would cost.

Joy:  I make beautiful things out of discarded materials.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Gabriel Fuzat
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable people to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people of all ages to reach their fitness or performance goals.  Whether they want to get fitter, faster or stronger, I will make them achieve their goals!

lenders.name: Catherine T
lenders.loan_because: I am at a point in my life where I am able to take care of myself and now am also fortunate enough to have the means to help others.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: People need to support people

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I like that I can actually help.
lenders.occupational_info: I find contruction subcontractors (like carpenters and plumbers) and bring them together to build stores, office buildings and hotels.

lenders.name: John & Patty
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed...

lenders.name: PS 150 Givers
lenders.loan_because: We want to help out and make a difference.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: What an exciting way to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and implement computer and automation systems.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to be able to support themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a pharmacist in profession but currently  a premed student, and in the process of my application to podiatric medical school.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think our world needs to change, and we are the people who can change it.  I really like the idea of micro-loans, so it's a cool way to make a little difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a computer programmer in a local clothing business.

lenders.name: Woodfield School
lenders.loan_because: We are a tutor class at Woodfield School in London, UK. We loan so we can see how our money helps people across the world to improve their lives and education.
lenders.occupational_info: We are pupils in Year 9 at Woodfield School and we use Kiva to help us to learn about life in other countries, whilst we help them to improve their lives. Every year a different  Year 9 class works with Kiva and we are the fifth Year 9 class to raise funds and loan through Kiva to help others. We like to loan to people who are starting businesses, working in food production or trying to improve themselves through education (like we are!)

lenders.name: ProsperingWoman
lenders.loan_because: I believe in self-determination.

lenders.name: Monica&Dave
lenders.loan_because: this is an excellent way of giving a hand to those who are working hard to make a living under circumstances so much more difficult than ours.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: It's one way to do our global duty.
lenders.occupational_info: Scientific research.

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I'm investing in real people, with real needs and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: An exercise in sharing stories, with all the passion that I can muster. Nice work, if you can get it. ~_^

lenders.name: Juan Carlos
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs have a social responsibility to prove what industrialization failed to do so: the only way out of poverty is not by getting larger & bigger but by reaching out the farthest, serving those unfortunate that belong at that "long tail" of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people/companies with their financial situation, either by pointing them in the right direction or by encouraging them to take matters in their own hands.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: My uncle gave my a gift card for my Conformation, and this website definitly caught my interest.

lenders.name: Alex

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large Telecommunications company supporting Government accounts in California.

lenders.name: Robert and Josh
lenders.loan_because: Oprah said to.  That's also why we buy cage free eggs, and don't text while we drive.
lenders.occupational_info: Artistic

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: That's how my mama raised me. (Hi, Mom!)

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to encourage growth and self starting where it is a challenge.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the internal information infrastructure, intranet and external website for a replacement window and vinyl siding manufacturer.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: i am an entrepreneur myself and have been blessed with success.  now i want to give back and help others succeed as well.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a graphic designer, and i help companies understand how to use the internet to make their business better.

lenders.name: Geno
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own a couple of TV stations and get to travel the world to bring back stories of what these places and people  are really like.
I have the greatest job.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I realize that I'm very blessed with all that I have and I want others to feel the same way
lenders.occupational_info: I go to class Monday through Friday at the University of Texas in Austin, Texas.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.loan_because: You can only change the world by changing one person's world at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Photographing life, writing wrongs, helping people help people.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward..."In the order of nature we cannot render benefits to those from whom we receive them, or only seldom. But the benefit we receive must be rendered again, line for line, deed for deed, cent for cent, to somebody."
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Regional Transportation District in Denver.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I respect people trying to improve their lives, and want to help them do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Denver.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I think people just need a hand up sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand one another.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed my life in many ways.  I want to help others who are in need.  Those who have should help those who have not.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Herbalife Distributor and love to help people with their health and wellness goals!  I also teach children with disabilities part-time.

lenders.name: Ivar Mykland
lenders.loan_because: There are no excuses not to

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I like to help out where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a tourism company in Tasmania, Australia.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others in any way I can.

lenders.name: Emily and Evans
lenders.loan_because: we want to share our love with our global neighbors by providing them with substantive support.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I own a software development business specializing in building innovative web based solutions to such as  www.tooeasy.com.au using the opensource  www.DotNetNuke.com platform.

lenders.name: Joel, Kai, Henry & Ben
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of investing and being charitable at the same time.  We have also read some interesting articles on microfinance, and we have friends who are Kiva members.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an attorney / claims adjuster for an insurance company. 

My wife (Kai) is an attorney / lobbyist working on behalf of physicians. 

Henry (6) and Ben (2) are our sons.

lenders.name: Alina
lenders.loan_because: this is therapy shopping that really helps!

lenders.name: Black Steve
lenders.loan_because: credit is the foundation of trade, which, in turn, is the foundation of civilization. Really.

lenders.name: Hugo
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the little things that I have and make a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to empower others to become self-sufficient.  Loaning is like giving a hand up instead of a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer for the City of Chicago Department of Law.  I litigate state and local tax cases.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Getting product to the corners of the globe.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I've seen in vulnerable communities in India how desperation can force individuals to rely on unscrupulous moneylenders and the damage this can cause. Human bondage and suffering can easily be avoided by this sort of microcredit
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a young but enthusiastic development worker who has spent time with UN agencies, local NGOs and international NGOs in India, Nepal and Ecuador

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: As an American I want to undo some of the damage my country has caused the poor people of the world.

lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives. lenders.occupational_info: I am trained as a teacher but also worked as a Secretary.  My husband was manager of a university bookstore for 36 years.  Through the Coady Institute in Antigonish, Nova Scotia, people from third world countries come to train in the cooperative movement started here in Nova Scotia, by Dr. Moses Coady. They then take those skills back to their towns and villages to teach and help their people improve their standards of living.

lenders.occupational_info:
Healing from Within--Mind, Body, Spirit. 

Dr. Dorothy has the unique gift of connecting people with a broad range of profound principles that resonate in the deepest part of their being. She brings awareness to concepts not typically obvious to one's daily thoughts and feelings.

Biography

Dorothy M. Neddermeyer, PhD, has 33 years experience with healing, personal development and peak performance. She developed a unique process to Create Your Dynamic Future. This process teaches people how to consciously access their innate power to both heal illnesses and blockages and to create unlimited success.
